item.description:
So, July 2007 is coming, and you know what means? The end of July marks a year that the Boston/Cambridge Meetup Group has been around. I thought I would try to do something that comes full circle. I wanted to have the July meetup at the first meetup event we had....The SalsaBoston Salsa Cruise!

However, this year, I'd like to do lunch together before the cruise. I figure we can meet up a couple hours early, do lunch near the ship, and head over to the cruise for the preparty and class. The dinner will be held at the following:

---------------------------------------------
Legal Sea Foods, Long Wharf
255 State Street
Boston, MA 02109
Phone: 617.742.5300

More information about the restaurant can be found at: http://www.legalseafo...

Dinner time: 5pm

I have made a reservation for 10 people! So, please email me separately (http://salsa.meetup.c...) from RSVPing here to reserve a seat.

Look forward to seeing you there!
---------------------------------------------



If you don't like ships and don't want to come out on the cruise, you can still join us for lunch!


Schedule:

5:00 Lunch/Dinner at a Restaurant
6:30-7:45 Leave for lesson and drinks at dock
7:45-10:15 Cruise! With 2 decks of dancing (lower deck for mixed music)

Prices for the Cruise have gone up this year, but I was still able to get a slight discount! It will be $18 (add an extra 75 cents for the paypal fee). This will be for the cruise itself. If you would like to take the lesson, you can pay an extra $2 when you buy the ticket or at the door. Please email us for this option.

General admission is $24 at the dock, so make sure to purchase your ticket in advance!

LOOK FORWARD TO SEEING YOU GUYS THERE!!!!!

ANA & ANARA





*******More information on the cruise:*********

Join 300-450+ people each Sunday this summer for Boston's hottest harbor dance cruises! Learn to dance, meet people, see the Harbor!

Featuring a full evening of entertainment:
o 6:00-7:45: Dockside Salsa Lesson and Preparty at "The Landing", Long Wharf on the Harbor
o 7:45-9:45: Cruise! 2 Decks of Dancing
o 2 DJ's: DJ D. Martinez spinning Salsa and DJ Mike Mercado spinning Latin all evening
o Authentic latin buffet on board (extra cost), Cash bar
o 10pm-close: After-cruise party at Mojitos Lounge, free admission for cruise attendees (21+, 19+ ladies)

General admission tickets are $24 at the dock, $19 advance, and group discounts are available.

The cruise is All Ages.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: July Salsa Cruise Meetup!
